folder: Richmond Terrace & Northfield Avenue, Staten Island, NY
text:
3316 Richmond Terrace, south side, west of Northfield Avenue. The house belonged to J. B. Palmer in 1898 and to W. M. Armstrong in 1907. The view is westward.
September 25, 1931
P. L. Sperr
title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Northfield Avenue

folder: Richmond Terrace & Northfield Avenue, Staten Island, NY
text:
3308 Richmond Terrace, adjoining the S.W. corner of Northfield Avenue. It was the home of John Decker, a Virpinia oysterman; also an oyster planter in Prince's Bay.
September 28, 1924
By Wm. T. Davis through P. L. Sperr
title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Northfield Avenue
